welcome.title: Welcome to Finans√∂r! üéâ
welcome.description: Meet the fun side of savings
welcome.content: Finans√∂r makes financial management fun by gamifying it. Track income-expenses, earn XP, level up and unlock achievements!
welcome.feature5: üîí Your data is safe on your device

addTransaction.title: Adding Transactions
addTransaction.description: Easily track your income and expenses
addTransaction.content: You can add income or expenses from the form on the home page. You earn XP for each transaction and can level up!
addTransaction.tip3: Adding regular transactions helps unlock achievements

viewStats.title: Statistics
viewStats.content: On the statistics page, you can see monthly trends, category analysis and your savings rate.

achievements.title: Achievements and Levels
achievements.content: Earn XP for each transaction, level up and unlock 25+ different achievements. You can share your achievements on social media!

error.title: An Error Occurred
error.description: Sorry, an unexpected error occurred. Please reload the page or return to the home page.

validation.amountPositive: Amount must be greater than zero

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.emptyDescription: Set a monthly goal or add transactions

groceries.0: Your grocery spending is high. You can save by bulk shopping and tracking discounts.
groceries.1: You can avoid unnecessary shopping by planning weekly menus.
groceries.2: Don't go to the store without a list. This prevents unnecessary spending.

transport.0: You might consider using public transport to reduce your transportation costs.
transport.1: You can save both health and money by walking or cycling for short distances.
transport.2: You can reduce transportation costs by car sharing or carpooling.

entertainment.0: You can plan home activities to reduce your entertainment spending.
entertainment.1: You can track free events and promotions.
entertainment.2: You can take control by setting a monthly entertainment budget.

shopping.0: Think about whether you really need it before shopping.
shopping.1: You can buy at more affordable prices by waiting for discount periods.

bills.0: You can avoid late fees by paying your bills on time.
bills.1: You can reduce your electricity bills by using energy-efficient devices.
bills.2: You can find more affordable packages by comparing different providers.

health.0: You can avoid major health expenses by having regular health checkups.
health.1: You can reduce health costs in the long term by adopting a healthy lifestyle.
health.2: You can evaluate health insurance options.

rent.0: You can research more affordable areas to reduce your rent costs.
rent.1: You can share rent costs by living with a roommate.
rent.2: You can negotiate when renewing your rental agreement.

education.0: You can take advantage of free online courses.
education.1: You can reduce book costs by using library resources.
education.2: You can research scholarships and education support.

general.highExpenses80: Your expenses are more than 80% of your income. Review your expenses to save money.
general.highExpenses60: Your expenses are more than 60% of your income. You can take control by making budget planning.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for may not exist or may have been moved.
